creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
markings:
Stamp in blue, verso, lower left: [initial P inscribed in a diamond] [Lugt 2066b]
Stamp in black, verso, lower left: [circle with initials D.F.P.] [Lugt 750a]
inscribed:
In ink, on altar: ORCIVIA | NIGELIA | V. S.L. M
 In ink, upper right: Vedi nel | Codice Ferrarini | in Archivio | p.a Ital. in Germia [later hand]

texts.textentryhtml: Dan Fellows Platt (Lugt supp. 750a and 2066b) lower left verso
